text: Thomas Alfred "Tommy" Broome (14 January 1892 – 5 September 1956) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1956 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Salford United F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Nelson F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Great Harwood F.C. players Category:Sandbach Ramblers F.C. players Category:CWS Balloon Street F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tommy Broome
